PERSONA:
meet harold thompson, a 67-year-old retired manufacturing plant supervisor living in a cozy suburban neighborhood in the metropolitan area of columbus, ohio, in the heart of the midwest. born and raised in the united states, harold is a proud american who values his heritage and community. he is a white non-hispanic male with a strong protestant faith, considering himself a born-again christian who occasionally attends church services a few times a year.

harold is a high school graduate who later earned an associate's degree in business administration from a local community college. he has been married to his loving wife, carol, for over 40 years, and they have two grown children who have moved out of the house to start their own families. the couple enjoys spending time with their grandkids and engaging in community activities.

as a self-identified conservative, harold leans towards the republican party and is registered to vote. he actively participates in local elections, valuing his civic duty. his annual family income ranges from $30,000 to less than $40,000, placing him in the middle-income tier. despite this, harold is content with his life and feels blessed for what he has.

in his free time, harold enjoys woodworking, gardening, and watching baseball games. he is an avid internet user, often browsing news websites and staying updated on current events several times a day. although not as active in volunteering as he used to be, harold occasionally participates in neighborhood clean-up events and donates to local charities.

harold's life is simple, yet fulfilling. he is proud of his roots, his family, and his community, and he strives to live a life guided by his faith and conservative values.
